hookReason: Posts the latest message patch in the given channel

helpWithChannel.en-US: I post the latest message patch in $<channelMention>
helpWithChannel.fr: Je poste le dernier patch de message dans $<channelMention>
helpWithChannel.pt-BR: Eu posto o patch mais recente de mensagem em $<channelMention>

helpWithoutChannel.en-US: I post the latest message patch
helpWithoutChannel.fr: Je poste le dernier patch de message
helpWithoutChannel.pt-BR: Eu posto o patch mais recente de mensagem
